banner.heading: Combo of Foundation Course For Beginners and Advance Mutual Fund
banner.text: (Foundation Course For beginners + Advance Mutual Fund)

course.headings: The Art of Deep Fundamental Analysis
How to Do Forensic Analysis to Avoid Farzi Companies?
How to Take Your Portfolio From 10k to 100k & Beyond?

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: How to Invest Your First 10K - Part 1
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: At the start, we always think that every second stock we find is an excellent opportunity, or some of us realise that we have been missing many opportunities, and both things are not valid. In this section, we start with the basics of investing your first money.

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: How to Invest Your First 10K - Part 2
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: This section is like a handheld support to help you invest your first 10K.
syllabus_for_foundation_course.alt: Understand how to grow your initial investment

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: How to Invest in Your First Winning IPO
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Investing in an IPO for listing gain and holding the share for the long term are two different things, and this section deals with both. After this section, you will be able to find such IPOs that give you quick wins in the form of listing gain or can give you a stock to hold on to.

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: 5 Tools to Pick Winning Stocks Faster
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Here you will learn to do basic financial analysis and ratios to pick fundamentally good stocks for your portfolio which can outperform the index in the long term.

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Penny Stock ki Duniya
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: How can you find a penny that can be a titan for you?

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Avoid These 3 Mistakes to Save Lakhs
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: It is essential to know what to do in the stock market, but it is more important to know what NOT to do in the stock market.

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Psychology of Making Money
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Making is not an art, nor is it a science. It is a craft. A craft that can be perfected with the right tools, technique, mindset and more. And this section will talk about that.

syllabus_for_foundation_course.title: Saving Your Stock Taxes
syllabus_for_foundation_course.subtitle: Do you want to give away your profits from the stock market to anyone? I hope not. This section will talk about the best way to save your capital gain taxes.

syllabus_for_Mutual_Fund.title: Ep1 - Building Foundation in Mutual Funds
syllabus_for_Mutual_Fund.subtitle: It is the only section for absolutely beginners. It prepares you for the advanced techniques and methods of Mutual Funds.

syllabus_for_Mutual_Fund.title: Ep2 - Fundamental Concepts of Mutual Funds
syllabus_for_Mutual_Fund.subtitle: Finding the right mutual fund is like finding a partner. Mutual funds are used to fulfil goals.

syllabus_for_Mutual_Fund.title: Ep3 - Which Mutual Funds Are Worth It?
syllabus_for_Mutual_Fund.subtitle: Every mutual fund is not worth the risk or time it takes to grow your money, so which one?

syllabus_for_Mutual_Fund.title: Ep4 - Designing Your Mutual Funds Portfolio?
syllabus_for_Mutual_Fund.subtitle: Mutual Funds are already diversified, So do you need to have multiple mutual funds in your portfolio, if yes how and why?
syllabus_for_Mutual_Fund.alt: How to check Cash Flow Statement

pricing.comboText1: Combo of Foundation Course For beginners and Advance Mutual Fund

candidate.courseTxt: Those who want to start their investment journey independently

faq.question: Does this course include Fundamental Analysis 1.0?
How this course is different from The Foundation Course On Indian Stock Market (Beginner)?
faq.answer: This course deals with more advanced applications and investment tools whereas the beginner course talks about basic practical applications in the stock market, which is very useful for a beginner. If you want to learn advanced tools and techniques to invest in the stock market you should go for this course.

faq.question: Is the course in Hindi or in English?
faq.answer: Course uses a primary language of Hindi but uses English as well in appropriate places

faq.question: Is it a pre-recorded course or live?
faq.answer: It is a pre-recorded course with lifetime access.

faq.question: Will I get a certificate of completion?
How to access this course after payment?
faq.answer: After payment you will get a login link and credential on your whatsapp number and mail. There you can access your course.

faq.question: Is this course focused on investors or traders?
faq.answer: This course is focused on long term investors.

faq.question: For what duration am I getting the course?
faq.answer: This course comes with lifetime access

faq.question: Can I get a GST Invoice with this course?
faq.answer: Yes, you will get a GST invoice.

faq.question: Does this course include technical analysis (Charts and indicators)?
faq.answer: This course is designed for investors and not for traders, hence it doesn't need technical analysis.

faq.question: What skills are needed for fundamental analysis?
faq.answer: You should have knowledge of basic maths with some working knowledge of the stock market.

clientTestimonial.name: Saurabh Kumar Srivastava
clientTestimonial.text: मैं पूरी ईमानदारी से कहना चाहूंगा कि यह फंडामेंटल एनालिसिस का कोर्स मेरे जीवन का सबसे उच्चतम श्रेणी का कोर्स रहा है। इस में मैने कंपनी को गहराई तक एनालिसिस जैसे कि कंपनी के मैनेजमेंट, कैश फ्लो स्टेटमेंट, वैल्यूएशन, प्रोडक्ट एनालिसिस जैसी चीजें बहुत ही आसान तरीके से सिखाई गई वो भी खासकर हिंदी में जोकि हिंदी भाषी लोगों को। मैं प्रसाद सर को और पूरी फाइनोवेशन टीम को इस काम के लिए दिल से धन्यवाद करता हूं।🙏

clientTestimonial.name: Manohar Gupta
clientTestimonial.text: I work in Renew power. Thanks for such a delightful course. Learned a lot from your realtime examples and business stories. keep up the good work.

clientTestimonial.name: Wajid husain
clientTestimonial.text: Now I know how to find stock and how to invest. With less fear. He is a mentor and I learn too many things from him. Thank you sir.

clientTestimonial.name: :Mohammad saddamhusen ansari
clientTestimonial.text: I have subscribed fundamental analysis course. Really it's game game-changing tool for me, now I'm in a position where I can research any company.

clientTestimonial.name: Nehal dalvi
clientTestimonial.text: I had an amazing experience with this course because it is very well explained. The best part of this course is its recorded so that we can listen again.” Staff is also very helpful.
